Champions League
OL: the nice record of Depay
The Dutch striker scored his second goal tonight against Benfica. The opportunity to set a record that will make Lyonnais nostalgic ...
05 Nov 2019, 21:22 by Rafael Da Silva

OL: all the rookies of the 2019 transfer window




This Tuesday night, Olympique Lyonnais receives Benfica for the fourth group match of the Champions League. Second in the standings after the Z√©nith defeat to Leipzig (0-2), Rudi Garcia's men could break away in case of victory against the Eagles. A mission that succeeds the Gones currently, they lead 2-0 thanks to goals from Andersen and Depay.




A first since Sonny Andersen




Depay decisive with his family + 7 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

And thanks to his achievement, the former Manchester United player has just set a record. Indeed, the player has just scored 4 goals in 4 pool matches, a performance that had not been achieved since ... Sonny Anderson! Note that the attacker came out injured at halftime.
